fields.name: Psalms 65:13
fields.value: 13 The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.

fields.name: Psalms 67:4
fields.value: 4 O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.

fields.name: Psalms 81:1
fields.value: 1 Sing aloud unto God our strength: make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob.

fields.name: Psalms 95:1-2
fields.value:
1 O come, let us sing unto the Lord: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.

2 Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.

fields.name: Psalms 96:12
fields.value: 12 Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice

fields.name: Psalms 126:5
fields.value: 6 They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.

fields.name: Isaiah 35:10
fields.value: 10 And the ransomed of the Lord shall return, and come to Zion with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads: they shall obtain joy and gladness, and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.

fields.name: Isaiah 51:11
fields.value: 11 Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return, and come with singing unto Zion; and everlasting joy shall be upon their head: they shall obtain gladness and joy; and sorrow and mourning shall flee away.

fields.name: Isaiah 65:13-14
fields.value:
13 Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, my servants shall eat, but ye shall be hungry: behold, my servants shall drink, but ye shall be thirsty: behold, my servants shall rejoice, but ye shall be ashamed:

14 Behold, my servants shall sing for joy of heart, but ye shall cry for sorrow of heart, and shall howl for vexation of spirit.

fields.name: Summary
fields.value: Joy is a blessing from God. God wants to give us comfort, peace and happiness. The joy of the saints is of God. Singing also brings joy. Thanksgiving also brings joy :).
